name: Feed the Monster (dalton, Kwadratus, xDRafal, Michal_M, MissThief)
name_original: Feed the Monster (dalton, Kwadratus, xDRafal, Michal_M, MissThief)
description:
First game at Sensei Game Jam by Dalton's Team, which include Dalton (sensei), Marta (graphic designer), Rafał, Michał, Mary (programming minions) and Dos (GIT Tutor).

Quick instrution: Your aim is to lead as many little monsters as possible towards the exit (red room). They react to sweets and go towards them. Be swift, because you have only 30 seconds to complete your mission. Gain sweets from a vending machine (you can take only 10 at once) and start.

W A S D - walking

right click - throw food

click on a vending machine to take sweets
